model.nodes

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.nodes.Node
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AStarNode, BFSNode, DFSNode

    public abstract class Node
extends java.lang.Object
    A node in a search area.
    Author:
    Ken Norman

        Gets the x coordinate.

        Gets the y coordinate.

      • getStatus

        public final NodeStatus getStatus()
        Gets the status of the node.
        Returns:
        The status of the node.
        See Also:
        NodeStatus

      • setStatus

        public void setStatus(NodeStatus s)

        Sets the status of a node.

        NOTE: The initial status of a newly created node is EMPTY.

        Parameters:
        s - The new status of the node.

      • isStart

        public final boolean isStart()
        Checks if the node is the start node.
        Returns:
        true if the status of the node is START
        false otherwise.

      • isFinish

        public final boolean isFinish()
        Checks if the node is the finish node.
        Returns:
        true if the status of the node is FINISH
        false otherwise.

      • isObstacle

        public final boolean isObstacle()
        Checks if the node is an obstacle.
        Returns:
        true if the status of the node is OBSTACLE
        false otherwise.

      • isWaypoint

        public final boolean isWaypoint()
        Checks if the node is a waypoint.
        Returns:
        true if the status of the node is WAYPOINT
        false otherwise.

      • isEmpty

        public final boolean isEmpty()
        Checks if the node is empty (i.e., not the start node, the finish node, an obstacle, or a waypoint).
        Returns:
        true if the status of the node is EMPTY
        false otherwise.

      • getParent

        public final Node getParent()
        Gets the predecessor (parent) node for a given node on the solution path. If the node is not part of the solution path, then the parent will be null.
        Returns:
        The parent node

      • setParent

        public final void setParent(Node parent)
        Sets the predecessor (parent) node of the current node. Applies only if the current node is on the solution path.
        Parameters:
        parent - The predecessor (parent) node of the current node.

      • hasParent

        public final boolean hasParent()
        Checks if the current node has a parent node.
        Returns:
          true if the current node is on the solution path and has a predecessor (parent) identified
          false otherwise

      • getSymbol

        public final java.lang.String getSymbol()
        Gets the one-character String to represent the status of the node.
        Returns:
        A one-character unicode String symbol:
        • START: S
        • FINISH: F
        • OBSTACLE: █
        • WAYPOINT_N: ↑
        • WAYPOINT_NE: ↗
        • WAYPOINT_E: →
        • WAYPOINT_SE: ↘
        • WAYPOINT_S: ↓
        • WAYPOINT_SW: ↙
        • WAYPOINT_W: ←
        • WAYPOINT_NW: ↖
        • EMPTY: " " (a single non-printing space)

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
